title: Lemon Bars
markdownBody:
## Ingredients

| Ingredient | Quantity |
| --- | --- |
| Flour | 2 Cups |
| Butter / Margarine | 1 Cup |
| Powdered Sugar | 1/2 Cup |
| Eggs | 4 |
| Sugar | 2 Cups |
| Flour | 4 Tablespoons |
| Salt | 1/2 Teaspoon |
| Lemon Juice | 5 to 7  Tablespoons |

1. Combine 2 cups of flour, all the butter and powdered sugar
2. Press into ungreased 9 x 12 pan
3. Bake 20 minutes at 350 Degrees
4. Beat 4 eggs, add
   1.  5 to 7 tablespoons lemon juice
   2. 2 cups of sugar
   3. 4 tablespoons
   4. 1/2 teaspoon salt
5. Pour on mixture on baked crust
6. Bake 25 minutes at 350
7. Sprinkle with powdered sugar while still warm
